product_name: Topeak Modula Water Bottle Cage II
long_description: Topeak Modula Cage II lets you adjust the cage to fit a wide range of water bottle sizes, so you can carry everything from traditional cycling water bottles to store-bought bottled water containers. Constructed out of sturdy aluminum and engineering-grade plastic for dependable performance. Cage size adjusts with a quick, easy push of a button-slide cage to fit the water bottle of choice and you're good to go.
short_description: Topeak Modula Cage II lets you adjust the cage to fit a wide range of water bottle sizes, so you can carry everything from traditional cycling water bottles to store-bought bottled water containers.
